item.title: How I Use Org Mode Part One
item.description: Since the last time I wrote about Org mode and my Doom Emacs set up I feel like some things will have changed. In fact, who am I kidding.. it’s always changing. The basic principles of my GTD and note taking would be the same anywhere but little things get tweaked and optimized all the time. I think I’m at a good place to record my current process and way of working here.
